0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Sion enters  stasis for 1.5 seconds to  reanimate into a frenzy, restoring 100% of his maximum health but losing 2 − 19 (based on level) health every 0.264 seconds, increasing by「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) health 」per subsequent tick. Sion's  health regeneration and any  healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.

1.text:
Sion can only move and use his basic attacks and item actives, and empowers himself with the following effects:
 1.75 attack speed minimum and maximum
 100% life steal
Deals bonus physical damage  on-hit equal to 10% of the target's maximum health, capped at 75 against non-champions
 Ghosting
One cast of  Death Surge, which replaces all of his abilities

2.text: Sion's damage to structures is reduced to 40% under the effects of Glory in Death.

0.text:
Active: Sion gains  67% bonus movement speed(bug) that decays over 2.376 seconds.
Once at least one ability has been learned, Death Surge can be cast using any ability key, even for the abilities that haven't been learned yet.

Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.

1.text: Decimating Smash can be recast within the duration, and automatically does so afterwards. If the charge is  interrupted, Decimating Smash is placed on a  2-second cooldown.

2.text: Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

3.text: If Decimating Smash was charged for at least 1 second, Sion instead slams his axe down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  knocking them up for 0.5 − 1 (based on channel time) seconds and  stunning them for 1.25 − 2.25 (based on channel time) seconds.

0.text: Passive: Sion gains  4 bonus health whenever he kills an enemy, increased to 15 for large enemies and  takedowns against enemy  champions.

1.text: Active: Sion gains a  shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.

2.text: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.

3.text: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities, other than the release of  Decimating Smash.

0.text: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds and inflicting them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: If the target is a  minion or non-epic  monster, they are also  stunned for 0.75 seconds and  knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting  sight of the area around their trajectory.

0.text: Active: Sion becomes  immune to crowd control and  ghosted and, after a brief delay,  charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.

1.text: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.

2.text: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion  leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain  stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the  bonus AD ratio increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

4.text: Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same physical damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time), increased to 0.75 − 1.75 (based on channel time) if they collided during the leap.

5.text: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.

0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Sion enters  stasis for 1.5 seconds to  reanimate into a frenzy, restoring 100% of his maximum health but losing 2 − 19 (based on level) health every 0.264 seconds, increasing by「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) health 」per subsequent tick. Sion's  health regeneration and any  healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Sandswipe: Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SANDSWIPE:  Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).

Unique – Giant Slayer: Deal 0% − 15% (based on maximum health difference) bonus physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum health than you.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – GIANT SLAYER: Deal 0% − 15% (based on maximum health difference) bonus physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum health than you.

Aura

Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of nearby enemies by 20% (700 radius).

Passive

Unique – Perfection: Gain 35% bonus critical strike damage if you have at least 60% critical strike chance.

Stats

+15 ability haste
+60 armor
+60 magic resistance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Monolith: Gain a shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – MONOLITH: Gain a  shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FORTIFY: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Sion enters  stasis for 1.5 seconds to  reanimate into a frenzy, restoring 100% of his maximum health but losing 2 − 19 (based on level) health every 0.264 seconds, increasing by「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) health 」per subsequent tick. Sion's  health regeneration and any  healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.

1.text:
Sion can only move and use his basic attacks and item actives, and empowers himself with the following effects:
 1.75 attack speed minimum and maximum
 100% life steal
Deals bonus physical damage  on-hit equal to 10% of the target's maximum health, capped at 75 against non-champions
 Ghosting
One cast of  Death Surge, which replaces all of his abilities

2.text: Sion's damage to structures is reduced to 40% under the effects of Glory in Death.

0.text:
Active: Sion gains  67% bonus movement speed(bug) that decays over 2.376 seconds.
Once at least one ability has been learned, Death Surge can be cast using any ability key, even for the abilities that haven't been learned yet.

Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.

1.text: Decimating Smash can be recast within the duration, and automatically does so afterwards. If the charge is  interrupted, Decimating Smash is placed on a  2-second cooldown.

2.text: Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

3.text: If Decimating Smash was charged for at least 1 second, Sion instead slams his axe down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  knocking them up for 0.5 − 1 (based on channel time) seconds and  stunning them for 1.25 − 2.25 (based on channel time) seconds.

0.text: Passive: Sion gains  4 bonus health whenever he kills an enemy, increased to 15 for large enemies and  takedowns against enemy  champions.

1.text: Active: Sion gains a  shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.

2.text: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.

3.text: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities, other than the release of  Decimating Smash.

0.text: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds and inflicting them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: If the target is a  minion or non-epic  monster, they are also  stunned for 0.75 seconds and  knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting  sight of the area around their trajectory.

0.text: Active: Sion becomes  immune to crowd control and  ghosted and, after a brief delay,  charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.

1.text: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.

2.text: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion  leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain  stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the  bonus AD ratio increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

4.text: Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same physical damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time), increased to 0.75 − 1.75 (based on channel time) if they collided during the leap.

5.text: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.
Active: Sion gains a  shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.
Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.
